item.title: Adding Dragon Claws Special Attack
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Well I tried to add a dragon claws special attack and I can’t seem to make it hit 4 times only 2…
Heres the codes I have…

[code] public void DClawSpec() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) { // d claws
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(31);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(31);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(31);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}[/code]

If anyone could help me I’d appreciate it
Thanks, Moose

Read full topic
